h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Monk from the Sea
content: Head down the stairs, where you'll find another sealed building on the right guarded by an Overseeing Monk and some Thunder Rhino Masters, and several sets of stairs to the left.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Monk from the Sea'.
The content is as follows:
Head down the stairs, where you'll find another sealed building on the right guarded by an Overseeing Monk and some Thunder Rhino Masters, and several sets of stairs to the left.
